external_games.name: Kisaragi Gold Star: Nonstop Go Go!!

name: Kisaragi Gold Star: Nonstop Go Go!!
storyline: Nitta Futami, who lives in Kosmos Manor, has close childhood friends, all of whom have mysterious matching bracelets. All of my childhood friends other than Futami are idols at Koei Gakuin, and their talent in singing and playing the piano was recognized and they became scholarship students, but they all have some problems with their livelihood, so Futami takes care of them. came. A school festival is to be held at the same time as Jugoya, and the childhood friends are selected to be the main actors, but they seem to be acting strangely, and a mysterious bracelet tells them that they don't have time, which accelerates their anxiety. . Futami remembers his dream while trying to help the girls.
summary: Kisaragi Gold * Star: Nonstop Go Go!! is a Visual Novel video game, developed by Saga Planets and published by Piacci, which was released in Japan in 2013.
